name: bunny-wasm
description: WASM bindings for bunny-mdx - compile MDX to JSX in the browser or Node.js

scripts.build:wasm:ci: wasm-pack build --target web --release ../../crates/bunny-wasm --out-dir ../../crates/bunny-wasm/pkg && wasm-opt -Os --enable-bulk-memory --enable-nontrapping-float-to-int ../../crates/bunny-wasm/pkg/bunny_wasm_bg.wasm -o ../../crates/bunny-wasm/pkg/bunny_wasm_bg.wasm && cp -r ../../crates/bunny-wasm/pkg/* ./pkg/ && wasm-pack build --target nodejs --release ../../crates/bunny-wasm --out-dir ../../crates/bunny-wasm/pkg-node && cp -r ../../crates/bunny-wasm/pkg-node/* ./pkg-node/
scripts.copy:wasm:dist: mkdir -p dist/pkg-node && cp -r pkg-node/*.wasm dist/pkg-node/ && cp -r pkg-node/*.js dist/pkg-node/ && cp -r pkg-node/*.d.ts dist/pkg-node/

author: Bunny Contributors
